com.flowpowered.commons.store.block

Class AtomicBlockStore.DataMask

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.commons.store.block.AtomicBlockStore.DataMask
  • Enclosing interface:
    AtomicBlockStore

    public static class AtomicBlockStore.DataMask
extends Object
    Represents a mask used for packing multiple value inside the data short.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataMask(short mask, short shift)
      Constructs a new data mask from the mask and the shift, which is the position of the data in the short.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      short apply(short value)
      Applies the mask to the value.
      short extract(short value)
      Extracts a value from another using the mask.
      short getMask()
      Returns the data mask.
      short getShift()
      Returns the shift.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
